attributes.action: Government furlough scheme to include workers employed after 28th February
attributes.additional_details: This is a huge oversight and puts thousands of workers at risk, with no income and little to no prospect of getting employment in the current economy.
attributes.background: Omit the clause that employees who started work after the 28th February are not entitled to this funding. To preserve jobs, employers should be eligible to claim the 80% relief of the salary of every employee, regardless of the starting date.
